ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Timorous Deep Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Um, perhaps this is a matter of semantics.  the ... To me, a shuttle is a boat.  I am also quite reluctent to paddle around in the water for 20 min or so,
ygData.messageBody:
--- Daniel Sniderman <fuzzbone@...>
wrote:
> Sorry, but to quote the McLaughlin group "WRONG!"
>
> I've taken the shuttle to the boat three or four
> times from Timorous Deep.
> Sorry you got killed without knowing about it.

Um, perhaps this is a matter of semantics. the
original question posed was:

> I am not finding info on how you get from Timorous
> Deep to the rest of
> Kunark except via boat, as a bard, IS there a way?

To me, a shuttle is a boat. I am also quite reluctent
to paddle around in the water for 20 min or so,
checking my loc all the while so that I can attempt
climbing onto one of those tall shuttles. I don't
have the patience and I am not that brave...there is a
lvl 50 or thereabouts mob that swims near the teleport
pots for the evil races....I wasn't willing to wait
around to see if it ranges far or has a cousin the
lives to the North;-)
